notes: masculine base lemma; also has feminine 'prossima' when used as a noun
example_sentence_english: Next!
Is there a next person?
The next one has already arrived.
The next ones will arrive soon.
The next ones will be easier.
I spoke about some of the next ones.

example_sentence_italian: Il prezzo del prossimo concerto è alto.
example_sentence_english: The price of the next concert is high.
Let's move to the next one.
Speak to the next ones.
I leave on the next train.
I have news from the next ones.
In the next episode a lot happens.

example_sentence_italian: Nei prossimi giorni sarà più tranquillo.
example_sentence_english: In the next days it will be calmer.

example_sentence_italian: C'è un articolo sul prossimo evento.
example_sentence_english: There is an article about the next event.
I have information about the next ones.
I leave with the next train.
I work with the next ones.

notes: feminine form of noun use; pairs with masculine 'prossimo'
example_sentence_english: The next one is already ready.
Is there a next one?
The next one (feminine) has arrived.
The next ones will arrive tomorrow.
The next ones will be announced soon.
I spoke about some of the next ones.

example_sentence_italian: Il risultato della prossima competizione è incerto.
example_sentence_english: The result of the next competition is uncertain.
See you at the next one.
Speak to the next ones.
I return from the next one.
I receive messages from the next ones.

example_sentence_italian: Nella prossima scena c'è un colpo di scena.
example_sentence_english: In the next scene there is a twist.
In the next weeks I will work a lot.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto un articolo sulla prossima conferenza.
example_sentence_english: I read an article about the next conference.
There is information about the next ones.
